text:
I like to suggest two new tasks:


1) A task which sorts text files. 


2) A task which compares to different resource files. Rationale: In order to 
maintain resources files for different languages it may become a huge effort to 
keep them in sync. A task like this would ease this issue.
creator: wieland.oliver@t-online.de
mbenson@apache.org
text:
For 1), you can use ant-contrib's sortlist task:

<project xmlns:ac="antlib:net.sf.antcontrib">
  <echo file="unsorted">foo
bar
blah
abc
woo
hoo
</echo>
<loadfile property="unsorted" srcfile="unsorted" />
<ac:sortlist property="sorted" delimiter="${line.separator}" value="${unsorted}"
 />
<echo>$${sorted}=${sorted}</echo>
</project>

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text:
For 2), need more info.

Better not to mix RFEs, also.

creator: mbenson@apache.org
